Name: WASTE
About the game: WASTE is a retro, pseudo 3D RPG where you take on the role of a Dustbin / Garbage man, collecting WASTE from the houses of the street you are working on, avoiding obstacles like cars, bikes, dogs, etc, if you are efficient and keep off the grass, your customer is happy and they will invite you inside to play on their new computer or ask favours to earn more money. Each street has a time limit, so you cant waste time, the faster you are, the more money you get, and your gaffer is happy. GAME FEATURES: Fast paced obsticle dodging action. Rough areas have extreme obsticles. Do requests from happy customers to earn more money.
